# qSIP2

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The qSIP2 R package is a refactored and reimagined version of the [original qSIP pipeline](https://bitbucket.org/QuantitativeSIP/qsip_repo). More to come!

## Installation

You can install the development version of qSIP2 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jeffkimbrel/qSIP2")
```
